class.name: LWLRF/FFTConverterNodelet
class.description: This nodelet handles converting raw navtech RAS3/RAS6 messages to PCL2 messages

class.name: LWLRF/CloudFilterNodelet
class.description: This nodelet handles filtering the output from a LWLRF-compatible FFTConverter

class.name: LWLRF/MotionCompensationNodelet
class.description: This nodelet handles accoutning for vehicle motion on a per-scan level
